    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108594</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Total eclipse of the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesamteklipse der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éclipse totale du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eclipse total do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eclipse totale del sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνολική έκλειψη του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eclipse total del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a shadow casting over the entire light bulb. This is what happens to the Earth during total eclipse of the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planetary motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Schattengußteil über 
der gesamten Glühlampe. Dieses ist, was der Masse während der 
Gesamteklipse der Sonne geschieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un bâti d'ombre 
au-dessus de l'ampoule entière. C'est ce qui arrive à la terre
pendant l'éclipse totale du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma carcaça da sombra 
sobre o bulbo claro inteiro. Este é o que acontece à terra 
durante o eclipse total do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un pezzo fuso 
dell'ombra sopra l'intera lampadina. Ciò è che cosa accade 
alla terra durante l'eclipse totale del sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια σκιά που πετά πέρα 
από τον ολόκληρο ελαφρύ βολβό. Αυτό είναι τι συμβαίνει 
στη γη κατά τη διάρκεια της συνολικής έκλειψης του ήλιου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un bastidor de la 
sombra sobre la bombilla entera. Esto es qué sucede a la tierra
durante el eclipse total del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
